name: Overtime Pay
storyline:
"Overtime Pay" is a first-person horror game. At midnight on a weekday, you find yourself working late alone in an eerily empty office. Suddenly the telephone rings. The game is short with only two chapters, while it tells a really creepy story. There are several unexpected twists during the game. You may reach different ends depending on your 'overtime performance'!
As a diligent employee of the company, you need to be careful to follow the telephone's instructions to print documents and receive faxes. New instructions will be given as time passes. What started out as boring overtime is starting to get dangerously weird. Getting the job done is necessary for you to get your overtime pay, but don't forget that surviving is too…
summary: As the clock strikes midnight, you find yourself trapped within the oppressive confines of a desolate office. Your task seems straightforward: Keep putting the correct paper in the correct place and you might find yourself entitled to overtime pay. And will you?
